description: This Dart source file defines shared application-wide constants for UI styling, including spacing, radii, shadows, and color aliases. It imports Flutter material components and a custom Ocean theme, and provides classes with static constants for consistent styling throughout the app.

classes.name: AppSpacing
classes.description: Contains constants for spacing and padding values used globally in the app.

classes.name: AppRadii
classes.description: Defines radius constants and BorderRadius objects for rounded corners.

classes.name: AppShadows
classes.description: Provides methods to generate BoxShadow lists for different shadow styles based on color schemes.

classes.name: AppColors
classes.description: Defines color alias constants referencing the OceanTheme palette for convenient use.

methods.name: cardLight
methods.description: Generates a subtle surface shadow with primary tint for light themes.

methods.name: cardElevated
methods.description: Generates a slightly stronger shadow variant for elevated surfaces.
